data.text:
BYOB (bring your own bike) 🚴
You have a bike. Bring it with you. Pack your stretchy pants too. To save more, simply add your bike at the time of booking or during online check-in and leave it with us at the airport baggage drop-off. Visit https://t.co/hHhKsDUPjO for more! https://t.co/hA5DcIJNIl

*one-way. taxes & fees incl. Limited seats available. https://t.co/drnQZHOR9P

*one-way. taxes & fees incl. limited availability. https://t.co/JhfyrmsZki

urls.title: Government of Canada will remove pre-entry test requirement for fully vaccinated travellers on April 1 - Canada.ca
urls.description: Today, the Government of Canada announced that effective April 1, 2022 at 12:01 AM EDT, fully vaccinated travellers will no longer need to provide a pre-entry COVID-19 test result to enter Canada by air, land or water. Fully vaccinated travellers seeking to arrive in Canada before April 1, 2022, must still have a valid pre-entry test.

More growth is on the horizon! Flair is expanding its base in Kitchener-Waterloo with increased frequencies, an additional aircraft and two NEW routes:
#YKF ✈️ #YSJ, effective June 8, 2022 (3x weekly)
#YKF ✈️ #YYG, effective June 9, 2022 (2x weekly) https://t.co/mAEbkMp1g3

NEW routes!/NOUVELLES routes!
• Ottawa ✈️ Charlottetown (starting July 6)
• Ottawa ✈️ Victoria (May 7)
• Toronto ✈️ Halifax (May 1)
